Posts.Content: And first chemo (T/C) is this Friday, 02-26, so I expect to be bald by my birthday. When it happens, I'm gonna try to think of it as my special "gift" to myself - chosing LIFE, over hair...
Posts.Title: When is your Birthday?

Posts.Content: And first chemo (T/C) is this Friday, 02-26, so I expect to be bald by my birthday. When it happens, I'm gonna try to think of it as my special "gift" to myself - chosing LIFE, over hair...
Posts.Title: When is your Birthday?

Posts.Content: and relax. All will be OK. You've made it this far, conquering so many other first's. You are strong and can handle this. Sending you many hugs and prayers. I'll be watching for your update.
Posts.Title: Say a prayer for me please...
